Rooms are decent with good A/C, free WiFi, and clean bathrooms.  Location is in a busy intersection with some traffic noise at night.  Close to the airport with a free shuttle.  Overall, a good place to stay and decent value.

Summary: If your room is pool side be prepared for significant traffic noise starting at 4am due to the nearby highway. I often thought the windows were possibly open but they weren't. I believe the window construction lacked the necessary noise cancellation. The service was excellent in every way. The hallways are very long and have multiple turns. The signage directing you to the elevator for the lobby could definitely be improved. The hotel gets 4 stars for the service, the restaurant, and it is 3 minutes from John Wayne airport. An update of the facilities for sound and signage takes it to the next level.

I called and Jose was able to contact Housekeeping, who had thankfully recovered it and he took care of shipping to me without any hassles.  Maybe no big deal in the greater scheme of things, but it was unusually nice that the HI staff did hang onto the electric toothbrush and take the time to ship it.

Summary: We were greeted by Clara, who was extremely helpful and friendly.  The property was as advertised, everything was nice and clean.  The room is very spacious and nice. We are very happy with this hotel!  Thanks.
Manager Response: Dear Brad B,  Thank you for posting a wonderful review in tripadvisor. We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay. Looking forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We spent a good week here. The staff was courteous but we really didn't have much interaction with them. The only inconvenience we had during our stay was the main lobby front doors were inaccessible for half the stay. My husband kept saying it was a "ghetto" place but I couldn't understand what he was talking about. Family member booked and paid for the room for us so I can't say if it was worth the price. I do know the beds were not true queen size as we have queens at home and these were smaller. The beds were comfortable, hospitality staff was great at cleaning/picking up each day. I was disappointed there was no complimentary continental breakfast as there are in other places we've stayed. There was nothing extraordinary or horrible about this stay/place.
Manager Response: Dear Christina Steak, Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel property. We apologize for the inconvenience of our front entrance doors being closed and the rerouting of guests to an alternate entrance while our porte de cochere was being painted. We value all feedback and always strive to improve our services.  Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport.

Summary Heading: Great place, great customer service and great price
Summary: We spent our last 3 nights of the California trip at Holiday Inn Santa Ana-Orange County Airport from July 2sd to 5th. The room is large and quiet.  The staff is the best.  They do the best to accommodate the customer.  For some reasons, our initial room smelt badly.  Just a quick call and we moved to a new room plus free breakfast the next morning. The staff intervenes quickly when you ask something !  Moreover, free parking and free internet are the BIG plus here in this area.  Finally, this hotel is next to the highway so it's very convenient when you plan to go around.
Manager Response: Dear Mike_TMR, We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay at the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport hotel and thank you for all your kind words regarding our staff and service. Thank you for taking the time to post a review. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: The Staff is a truly caring community
Summary: This is a tribute, a fan letter, and a love letter of sorts. My partner and I have been making the trip to Orange County several times a year to visit my terminally ill daughter, and always ask for their room with the specially handicapped big bathroom with the walk-in shower and large comfortable built in seat. (This requirement is almost impossible to find - oh sure, hotels will say they have handicapped facilities but, upon my questioning, they invariably turn out to mean a tub with a grab bar.) Nazario, who handles booking, always makes sure I get that room, as he knows my daughter could not otherwise stay with us and get that treasured escape from her isolated existance where  she lives. Carol and Ashley at the front desk have always responded promptly and cheerfully to any
Manager Response: Dear Barbara M. It is truly a pleasure having you and your family stay with us. We greatly appreciate all the wonderful comments regarding our staff and thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Orange County Airport as your home away from home. Thank you for taking the time to post a review and share your hotel experience. We really appreciate it.

Summary: Stayed three nights for a friend's wedding.  The rooms were large and quiet, which was surprising given the freeway and airport traffic.  The bartender was terrific; pleasant, efficient, and remembered the cocktail that you drank the night before.  The breakfast buffet was mostly quite nice; blueberry pancakes one day, French toast on the other two days, crisp bacon and sausage, rice and miso soup for Oriental guests, quick service with the coffee, though stay away from the scrambled eggs as they tasted like chalk.  The ground's landscaping was very good with a variety of flowers and shrubs.
Manager Response: Dear Dr.DEE 2014, Thank you for taking the time to post a review of our hotel. We are pleased you enjoyed our guest rooms and service from our bartender.  However, we apologize the scrambled eggs in our restaurant weren’t to your liking and will share your valuable feedback with our Chef. Thanks again for sharing your guest experience and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Clean and tidy, free transfers to and from the airport. My room was near the guest laundry so I  took the opportunity of cleaning my clothes. $1 wash, $1 dry. Slept well, staff friendly. Recommend this hotel, I will stay again next time I am in the area
Manager Response: Dear David B., We are glad you enjoyed your stay at the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport. Thank you for giving us a wonderful review and we look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: Would love to thank elvira Dan frank Clara lazario Petra thank you so much frank so such short notice on our stay was the best stay ever will come again.you guys are awesome had a very pleasant stay food was great my family enjoy every moment
Manager Response: Dear liliaoliden,  We appreciate your wonderful comments in regards to our staff and service provided.  Thank you so much for sharing your experience at the Holiday Inn Orange County hotel with others. We thank you for staying with us and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Hands down on of the best hotel experiences I have ever had, I do a lot of traveling and this was hands down the best hotel stays.  Cleanliness of the whole entire hotel was impressive, the staff was extremely friendly and went above and beyond with their customer service.  They also had an amazing shuttle drive name Jon that worked the graveyard shift that was sooooo sweet and nice.  I really loved my stay here and would come back just to get the full experience again,  Thank you so much for all the hard work you put into this hotel to make it the best.
Manager Response: Dear PinkVapor, Thank you so much for your 5 star review of the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport.  We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and were impressed with our hotel and staff. We truly appreciate you taking the time to review our hotel and share your experience with others. Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport. We hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely, Frank

Summary: I recently (12th - 16th May 2014) stayed at this Holiday Inn and had an excellent experience. This is perhaps the best Holiday Inn I have visited; the rooms were great and the staff were outstanding. Dan, Clara and Ruben were expecially helpful but all was above expecations. I can strongly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Mark R,  Thank you so much for giving us the perfect review. We are delighted you had an excellent experience with us and we exceeded your expectations. We thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport and hope you will be back to visit us again soon.

Summary: I've recently stayed at the Holiday Inn Santa Ana-Orange County Airport and had a great experience.  Aside from the amazing room (!), the staff were outstanding.  Clara (front desk) was especially helpful (I even called her supervisor to make certain that she got the recognition that she deserved).  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear 10HappyCustomer, We are pleased you enjoyed your stay at the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport and found our guest room and staff outstanding. Thank you for taking the time to post a review of our hotel and thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport. We hope to see you again soon!  Frank

Summary: I use the Holiday Inn every month for meetings and sleeping rooms. The staff always goes out of their way to make sure my stay is perfect.  Clara and Ashley at the front desk always make a great first impression. Alex, Gabriel, Raciel, and Jose make sure my meeting room is perfect everytime. Patricia, Annette, and Barbara always make sure all the details are taken care of.  The entire staff strives for perfection and always achieves excellence!..
Manager Response: Bob R.  We thank you for your wonderful comments about our staff and service and thank you for your continued loyalty and support of the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport.  We truly appreciate you taking the time to review our hotel and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Frank

Summary: Held a two-day seminar 2/25-2/26/2014 here with 39 in attendance, meeting room fantastic, food buffet and service EXCELLENT, staff is amazing. I definitely recommend this hotel for your stay or to hold a meeting.  Everything was perfect!
Manager Response: Dear Mariane S. We are pleased to hear your two day meeting event at the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport was a successful one.  Our Events Manager and Food & Beverage staff take great pride in their work to always ensure each event is perfect and exceeds guest expectations. Thank you for sharing your experience with us and we hope to have you back again soon!

Summary: Everything was outstanding from check in all the way through my five day stay through check out. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The rooms are extremely clean with all necessities needed. This was the first hotel I have been to that EVERY staff member was friendly and honestly cared. Not to far down the road is the district which have several places to eat with a vast amount of variety.
Manager Response: Dear Amy M, We greatly appreciate the 5 star review, as well as the wonderful comments about Ashley, Jose and Lorrie. We are delighted to hear you found our staff friendly and enjoyed our clean guestroom. Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Orange County Airport. We look forward to seeing you again soon  Frank

Summary Heading: they are trying to upgrade the image
Summary: Now that Holiday Inn has decided they want to put their big boy pants on and compete with some of the 5-stars, the image has come up quite a few degrees.  This is a nice property, medium-priced, and located well. Impressed by:  cleanliness, accommodating staff. I arrived way before check-in time and the staff quickly set me up in my room anyway.  That was a plus.  Got a nap before the next appointment, which really helped.  Kudos to the staff for that. Room was clean and quiet.  Kudos for that, too.  Parking is generous and included with the room fee.  No extra charges such as at other properties. Minor annoyances:  Breakfast buffet.  Food was good, but WAY overpriced.  Maybe have to make up for the parking. The rack rate was not a big value, but considering not having to pay
Manager Response: Dear Footloose Caboose,  We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your room accommodations and the service received from our staff.  We appreciate your candid feedback and thank you for taking the time to review the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Frank

Summary: A clean room when traveling is most important to me; this hotel definitely delivered. On top of that the staff was so easy to work with, always friendly and helpful with any questions I had. I talked with Ashley most frequently and she always had a smile on her face and did everything she could to help out in a difficult situation!  The location is also very convenient if you are spending time at Disney. Not in the middle of all the craziness, but only about 15 minutes away.
Manager Response: Dear Tricia W. We are delighted to hear you were pleased with our clean rooms and services provided. We always strive to make every guest feel at home and part of the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport family. Thank you so much for the wonderful review of our hotel. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with others! Sincerely,  Frank

Summary: This was a nice hotel with a very nice lobby area. The location was great. Near I405, 55, 73, and John Wayne Airport. The parking lot felt safe. The room was relatively clean.  The run in my room was a bit grimy. There was an old A/C system. (see photo) It worked fine, but I have not seen an old system like this in a long time. : -) There was great pillows and bedding. The shuttle to the airport started at 5:00 am. There was great lighting in the room. I had to wait 50 minutes at the airport for the shuttle.  Arrrgggghhhh. Carol at the desk was very nice. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Eulalia_3, We are pleased to hear you were happy with our hotel accommodations and the service provided by Carol at the Front Desk. However, we do apologize for the shuttle wait time at the airport and will share your comments with our staff.  Thank you for taking the time to review the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport and thank you for your valuable feedback.  We truly appreciate it.

Summary: After spending the better part of a year at this hotel I know the place pretty well. First, the front desk staff is nothing but the best. I see Carol and Marilyn's smiling faces nearly every morning, but sometimes it's someone else, but still a bright smile. Other times of the day I see all the front desk people. As I recall there's Clara, Bruce, Jesse, Nazario, Ashley, Dan, Jimmy and Raymond are all top notch. Frank, the head man, is lucky to have a crew like this. I spend a bit more time at the Restaurant/Bar, so I know these people a bit better. At breakfast, Lilia, Elvira, Arturo and others keep the place neat and clean with Gabriel watching over things. The Bartenders are as good as it gets.  Lorrie and Christine always know what you drink and mix everything perfect. Reuben
Manager Response: Dear Michael R, We are delighted to hear you are pleased with our hotel staff and services provided. We always try to make every guest feel at home and part of the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport family. Thank you so much for the wonderful review of our hotel. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and also appreciate you as a guest! Sincerely, Frank

Summary: We have our monthly meetings here.  Service is great even when we need more seating and food never disappoints, every month its always good and we have been coming here for years. Highly recommend if your looking to have meetings for clubs or organizations.
Manager Response: Dear Dave Y, We are pleased to hear your monthly meetings at the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport hotel are always a success and thank you for your continued support of our hotel. We truly appreciate your business! Our events staff  take great pride in their work and always try to ensure our meeting room guests are more than satisfied.  Thank you for taking the time to post a review and share your experience with others.  Sincerely, Frank

Summary: Staff is very nice. We stayed 6 days and used it for a hub. The bed was really comfortable. The not so good is if you stay on the ground floor and your room is by many of the side entrances you will here the doors slam. Whatever you do stay away from room 144 this is where the pool is and they have an iron gate that when closed can raise the dead.   5 of the 6 days we found the breakfast to be cold or in one case missing some of the entries even though there was plenty of time left before the cut-off time.   If you want to watch TV , you will find that the 40 channels they offer has no guide of info on the remote so it can become a quest to find out what is on the TV.
Manager Response: Dear Mark r,  We are glad to hear you found our staff to be very nice and our beds really comfortable. We do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced in our restaurant and will be sure to pass on your comments to our restaurant management.  Thank you for taking the time to post a review and for your valuable feedback, as we always strive to improve our services  Sincerely, Frank

Summary Heading: Good front desk and resturant customer service
Summary: My husband works around this facility and its basically a second home, Lilah from the morning crew in restaurant has great attention to detail and is AWESOME through costumer service. Ruben from the dinner crew listens very well, while still being friendly and also good attention to detail. But by far my families favorite person is Lorrie from the bar, she humors my kiddos, is very attentive and is pleasure to be around.. Alex the manager of the Panini is very charismatic and checks regularly if everything is ok :) housekeeping people listen nicely and clean well.  All around good food good and good place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear David-Corinne S, We thank you for taking the time to review the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport hotel and for all your kind words regarding our housekeeping staff, front desk staff, and our staff at our Panini Restaurant & Lounge. We greatly appreciate your business and thank you for your dedication to our hotel!  Frank

Summary Heading: Clara was amazing and so helpful!
Summary: Clara was beyond helpful and has exceptional customer service! She went above and beyond her job to accommodate our needs! We hope management realizes what good employee she is. She was friendly and professional!!!  We will return to stay at the holiday inn Santa Ana Orange County airport again. The location and staff were top quality!  The breakfast was also yummy and had a good variety of food! Thanks again!
Manager Response: Dear Jackie, We highly appreciate the 5 star review, as well as the wonderful comments about Clara and her exceptional service. We are also delighted to hear you enjoyed breakfast in our Panini Restaurant.  Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Orange County Airport. We look forward to seeing you again soon. Thanks, Frank

Summary Heading: Incredible service above and beyond excellent
Summary: The front desk staff and engineering personnel provided superlative service--incredibly kind and compassionate--driving me to and from the hospital for surgery when I fell ill--and all this for someone not even from the US--I am a Canadian and will tell everyone that I know or meet that Frank, Dan, Nazario, Jesse, Lawrence, Bruce, and Carol provided the best service I have ever experienced in over thirty years of international travel. A thousand thank you's for their help during a very difficult time.
Manager Response: Dear Isolady 176,  Thank you for your kind words in regards to our service and staff. We are always happy to assist our guests and truly appreciate your wonderful review of our hotel property. Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport. We hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely, Frank

Summary: Great staff!  Very accommodating, friendly and professional.  This is the third time our company has used this property for dealer meetings, EXPO's and Open House events.  We'll definitely be back.  Great location, close to John Wayne Airport; easy access to freeways - but most important is the great staff!  Thank you, Patricia & Crew.  Fred Carrillo - CAS-USA, Corp.
Manager Response: Dear Fred,  We are delighted to hear you had another wonderful experience at the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport.  Patricia and our banquets staff are the best and always strive to make every corporate event a successful one.  Thank you for giving us such a wonderful review and thank you for your loyalty to our hotel. We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Frank

Summary: I hosted a training here for a business meeting and I was pleased with the service they offered. I was also impressed at the quality of the food for being a hotel airport. The room was in pretty decent shape. I was inconvenienced a bit due to a water issue but nothing major. Convenient to Tustin, the airport, Newport Beach, etc. It's quiet, well maintained and the staff were accommodating. Thank you!!
Manager Response: Dear prnewman,  We are happy to hear you were pleased with our tasty food and friendly staff. Thank you for giving us a 5 star review. We sincerely appreciate you taking the time to share your hotel experience with others.  Frank

Summary: My husband and I won an overnight stay at his Christmas party I knew we would use it to celebrate our 15 year Anniversary.  Usually we stay at Embassy Suites in Brea so I was nervous that a Holiday Inn would not hold a candle to it. Plus it was a free night so I wasn't expecting much. WOW, was I wrong. We were greeted by Ashley and she was just super friendly and immediately wished us a Happy Anniversary. Then about 10 minutes after we checked in Nazario, the Restaurant/Room Service Manager, came to our room with 2 complimentary mini-bottles of champage.  Then we had dinner reservations at Maggiano's at South Coast Plaza and we were able to get a free shuttle to dinner.  Jesse drove us safely there and back again a few hours later, nothing but nice. The breakfast was just
Manager Response: Dear Teresa B,  Thank you for the wonderful review. We are happy to hear that you found our staff "Beyond Welcoming". We strive to uphold the standards of IHG in our Hotel. Your satisfaction is very important to us and we want our guests to have a rewarding and memorable experience. We look forward to your future stay with us. Have a wonderful day.   Thank you, Frank

Summary: The last minute travel can be stressful and expensive. I did my research and talked to the manager at the holiday inn by the airport name frank, there was a deal the day before but I couldn't pull the trigger the day after the price went up almost double. i spoke with frank and he was able to work with me a little not a ton but just the kind effort and him being compassionate enough to listen to me was all i could ask for. I was pleasantly surprised with the hotel and how nice and cozy it was. I would defiantly stay here again.  the food at hotel isn't great but so close to many wonderful restaurants around hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Donna B.  We are delighted to hear you were pleased with our hotel accommodations. Thank you for giving us a 5 star review. We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your hotel experience with others.  Sincerely, Frank

Summary Heading: What you expect from Holiday Inn
Summary: Good business hotel, fast wifi, very comfortable bed, very clean  Good selection of fruit at breakfast buffet - otherwise OK food  Hotel was full so we had to search a while for a parking spot in the lot
Manager Response: Dear Jim C,  We appreciate your kind words regarding our fast wifi, comfortable beds, and breakfast buffet selection. Thank you so much for taking the time to give us a review and thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Orange County Airport.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel, a bit much road noise
Summary: I definitely liked this hotel and would stay there again, just bring some ear plugs.   The staff were very friendly and helpful, the breakfast was nice (but a tad crowded), and the room was clean and modern.  The Wi-Fi worked flawlessly and there was a decent cocktail bar near the lobby.  Again, the road noise was a bit of a distraction, but a non-issue if you don't mind ear plugs.
Manager Response: Dear Bubba G,  Thank you for your kind words in regards to our friendly and helpful staff, our flawless wireless service, and our clean rooms. We appreciate you taking the time to share your guest experience with others. We hope to see you again soon  Frank

Summary: We stayed here for price and location with 10 minute proximity to beach and disneyland.  The staff was very friendly at front desk and every morning for breakfast.  Rooms were clean and workout room and equipment adequate.  Did not use pool area or pool so can not review it. Easy to get to from John Wayne Airport.
Manager Response: Dear William M,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. I am delighted to hear that you were pleased with our friendly staff, newly renovated gym, and our clean guest rooms. Thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Orange County Airport.

Summary: I stayed here for three nights over a long weekend. The staff is great, especially Ashley who checked us in late at night. The room is clean and average- we had a king bed with a sofa bed and desk. There is a microwave and fridge in the room, which is always a huge plus when traveling. The bathroom is very small, and I found very it odd how the toilet was closer to the shower than it was to the toilet paper holder!   Unfortunately, the rooms are not very sound proof. I'm not a light sleeper, but I was awoken in the middle of the night due to guests making noise in the hallway. Conversations in a normal volume could also be heard throughout the day.
Manager Response: Dear Militia_M,  Thank you very much for your review. We appreciate all comments and would surely have management be aware of your concerns. I am glad that you found my staff great upon checking in.  Sincerely, Frank

Summary: We two comfy queen beds in a spacious room.  The pool was heated and lovely! After a week in Hawaii we were glad to see a laundry facility as well.  Very pleasantly surprised by this hotel.  Easy access from several freeways as well.  Definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Dear CJW,  Thank you so much for a wonderful review and I am so glad that you enjoyed your stay in our hotel. We are looking forward for your next visit with us.  Sincerely, Frank

Summary: The Holiday Inn  at the Orange couinty airport is the definition of Excellence. They will make your stay at a great experience whether you are a guest in the hotel or reserving meeting space. I used the hotel not only for a sleeping room but held a seminar for 4 days and they did a great job. Patricia does a great job in making you feel at home and makes sure everything is perfect. I would recommed this hotel to anyone who is looking a hotel in the orange county area.
Manager Response: Dear Bob R,  It was pleasure reading your comments on tripadvisor. I am glad that you had a "Great Experience" staying in our hotel. Patricia is thrilled as well for being mentioned by name. Looking forward for your next stay with us and thank you very much for posting a great review about the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport.  Yours truly, Frank

Summary: Stayed for several weeks while on business. This hotel was convenient to shopping, restaurants and attractions. Staff was very polite and helpful. Hotel, like many others, has all the needed amenities. In addition, the room also had a fridge and microwave which was nice on an extended stay. Rooms and grounds were clean and very well kept. Now that I've tried this hotel, if I'm ever in the area again, this would be my hotel of choice. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone, especially to business travelers.
Manager Response: Dear Tonyinmanchester,  We highly appreciate your great comment about our hotel. We indeed are close to the malls, restaurant and the airport. Thank you for giving us a perfect review.  Frank

Summary: This hotel is indeed close to the airport, in fact I would probably have slept better on the runway! The noise was the worst I have ever experienced in over twenty years of touring in USA. We stayed for one night prior to a very long trip back to UK. All we required was an evening meal and a reasonable night's rest. This hotel provided neither. I ordered a burger in the dreary little eating area (it certainly isn't a restaurant)...finally arrived cold, sent it back etc. My husband had long since finished his meal before my second attempt arrived.The hotel appeared to be hosting some kind of "down market" sales event at the time....maybe this explains why paying guests were ignored.I think the Eagles wrote "Hotel California" after staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Linda C,  We are sorry you found our hotel to be less than satisfactory and apologize for any inconveniences you experienced during your visit with us. Your feedback is very important to us as we continually strive to improve our services and amenities we offer to our guests.  Thank you for taking the time to write a review and share your guest experience.  Sincerely, Frank

Summary: Nice property about 5 minutes from SNA airport. Free shuttle, close to highway, shopping and gas. Property has a restaurant, fitness & business center, pool and laundry room. Parking is free. Rooms are large and equipped with a refrigerator and microwave. The window in the room also opens for fresh air. The buffet breakfast was good and complimentary as a IHG member. Property is very clean and staff is friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler J,  Thank you so much for giving us a good review. The pictures that you posted are amazing. Looking forward to your next visit with us.  Frank

Summary: This is a pretty bland hotel in all respects.  I checked in shortly after 10pm and the bar was closed, so no snack or drink available.  The room was just bland, and was just functional - wireless worked, TV, etc.  Pretty close to a major highway but didn't hear any excessive noise.  The next day the small and cramped breakfast area was mobbed, you literally couldn't get around.  The buffet line was really weak, and after taking a look at the food coupled with the long and extremely slow moving line, I just left.  Don't think I'd go back but it wasn't due to anything bad, it was just so humdrum.
Manager Response: Dear funlonghorn,  We appreciate your comments and would like to thank you for your time to give us a review at Tripadvisor.

Summary Heading: Return to the Holiday Inn OC Airport
Summary: I have returned to the HI OC Airport since having an event here in June. The entire staff, food and beverage, desk, everyone made the stay for my family a memorable one. There are no words enough to describe the at home feeling they give.  Although, I live on the East Coast, I will return and continue to recommend this hotel to my many friends who travel.
Manager Response: Dear Betsy A,  We are so thrilled that you came back to our hotel and again gave us a wonderful review. As always the entire staff will always strive to excel our guests expectations and we are thankful that we made your stay a memorable one. We are all looking forward to your 3rd visit with us. Sincerely, Frank

Summary: Dear  Upper Management of the Holiday Inn Santa Ana-Orange County Airport  Khalid was more than helpful. He was very friendly and was more than willing to help me. I had just got stuck in and over night layover and Khalid took me to the hotel then waited for me to get settled in and gave me a rid to get food. He treaty me like family and I am more thank pleased with his service. I would come back again based on his services alone, and I would recommend the hotel to others. Whatever he is getting paid it is not enough for how generous and helpful he was!  Sincerely Ronald Thebeau
Manager Response: Dear Ronald T,  I highly appreciate the wonderful comment that you gave our Driver Khalid. He indeed excels in customer service. In behalf of the whole staff of the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport we thank you for the kind words that you accorded on Khalid. Sincerely, Frank

Summary: I truly cannot say enough good things about this Hotel. Patricia Gonzalez and her entire sales/catering team, as well as the complete hotel staff, took care of our every request with great efficiency and a smile. We held a large product/sales training seminar for the entire Western Region of Handicare USA, which includes 7 states, at this facility.  They provided everything asked for, from a glass of water, to shuttle service above and beyond the call of duty. I highly recommend that if your company is planning an event in this area, that you choose Holiday Inn Orange County Airport as your venue.
Manager Response: Dear Scott C, Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport for your event, I am pleased that you found our hotel to your satisfaction. In behalf of Patricia Gonzales and the entire staff we would like to convey our appreciation for the great comments. We are always ready to serve you.  Sincerely, Frank A.

Summary: I had a great experience from the start upon checking in at this hotel. The manager, Mr. Frank Atayde was very accommodating and made my stay a memorable one. I will definitely recommend this hotel to all my business associates, family, and friends.
Manager Response: Dear Allen R, I am humbled by your wonderful comment and pleased that you had a wonderful experience. Our superior level of service is what we strive for. Thank you for staying at the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport.  Sincerely, Frank

Summary: This was the nicest 3-star hotel I can remember staying at. I feel it should be rated as a 3.5-star and to be honest, I enjoyed it more than some of the 4-stars I have stayed at. This hotel is extremely clean, the rooms are nice, and the service was great. I really enjoyed the layout of the grounds and the pool/jacuzzi were nice. They have a bar, which in my experience, is not common for 3-star hotels.   I am putting this Holiday Inn at the top of my list for hotels around $100.
Manager Response: Dear Frank-Money,  Your comment that our hotel should have a higher rating is highly appreciated. I would like to personally thank you for staying in our hotel. We indeed strive to uphold the IHG standards in managing our hotel. Thank you sir.

Summary: I just want to thank your staff for the excellent service , they were very friendly and very helpful !!! I will stay there again !! You should be proud of your staff , I wish I could remenber the names of you staff I would like to personally thank the young lady she had blonde hair , im sorry for not remembering her name she checked us in she was a joy a person who takes pride in her job , I work in the hotel field and just wanted to congat your staff , thank you , Steven hassinger
Manager Response: Dear 2060 Steven,  Thank you so much for coming to stay with us! We are so happy that you enjoyed your experience especially the great service which you received. Thank you for the kind words about our staff. Ashley is the young lady that checked you in and we are very proud of her.  We really do try to make each one of our guests feel comfortable at our hotel. Please do come back and see us again on your next trip. We apreciate you staying and appreciate your business.

Summary: Everyone was amazing staff just to name a few Khalid was very friendly made the stay of our group very comfortable, Raymond was a great driver friendly attitude, Arturo was filling in as bartender and he did a fantastic job kept the drinks coming made the group feel positive, Ashley is a great asset she made great recommendations to go eat and even called to see if the place could accommodate our group made the reservation for us and coordinated the shuttle ,
Manager Response: Dear Manitzie,  The title of your comment " You gotta stay here", is amazing. My staff Khalid, Raymond, Arturo and Ashley would be so thrilled that you have mentioned them by name. I am so glad that you found our service to your satisfaction. Thank you very much.

Summary: This visit was for both business and pleasure.  The staff were great, from changing large notes for bus fares to arranging the shuttle to get to the shops, train station and John Wayne Airrport. The buffet breakfasts had enough variety to get us through a 4 day stay. The food in Panini Restaurant was freshly prepared and reasonable in price.  A special thanks to Clara and the rest of the staff on the front desk, and to Lorrie and the staff in the bar and restaurant.
Manager Response: Dear Jenny_Bob2013,  We appreciate the wonderful comments that you posted on tripadvisor and for giving us a perfect review. Clara and Lorrie would be delighted that you've mentioned their names. See you on your next trip.

Summary Heading: Sad Occasion made bearable by Holiday Inn and Staff in Santa Ana- Orange County

Summary Heading: Great Stay at Holiday Inn Santa Ana

Summary: Room was clean and a very comfortable bed,staff were extremely helpful when we couldn't check out on time. We were given a few options at no extra charge to our room. All staff were friendly and couldn't do enough to make us more comfortable , we will be coming back here on our next trip to visit our son  Thank you Holiday Inn Santa Ana Orange County
Manager Response: Dear jam001,  We appreciate your time in writing a spectacular review! We are very pleased to hear that you found our rooms clean and comfortable, as well as the excellent service our staff gave you when you couldn't check out on time.Thanks so much again, and we hope to see you back in the future!  Sincerely,

Summary: Great convenience, ammenities wth gym,pool,spa and clean comfortable rooms with great breakfast nice bar.Staff is very courteous and polite and they go beyond their way to please you all the way to the night crew and thank you khalid.I will be looking forward to staying there again.
Manager Response: Dear Mark,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We take pride in our great customer service, our wonderful breakfast, our awesomely convenient airport location, the excellent condition of our rooms and our very kind driver Khalid. We cant wait to host you again in the future!   Sincerely,

Summary: I just wanted to take a minute to say thank you to all the Holiday Inn staff. Ashley at the front desk went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed for our stay. She was more than helpful with all we needed before we even had to ask. I would recommend this location to others and stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear AMJAZ,  Thank you for taking the time out to give us a perfect review. As you have said regarding our "Excellent Service", everyone in our hotel strives to offer service which is above and beyond at all times. We are looking forward to see you again.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Clean and Comfortable Rooms. Great Breakfast. Friendly Staff!
Summary: I have been staying at this hotel every time I'm in Orange County. It is wonderful! The hotel is conveniently located near the airport and 55 freeway. The rooms are spacious, comfortable, and always clean. There is a nice gym with good equipment enabling a solid workout that can be followed with a swim and whirlpool soak in the outdoor pool.  I really like their breakfast! The buffet is great! REAL eggs (not powdered ones), REAL bacon (not microwave turkey strips), and a great selection of other items like French toast, oatmeal, fresh fruit (not frozen), juice, milk, cereals, etc - and if that is not enough, you can order from the menu!  The staff is wonderful - friendly, courteous, attentive, and responsive. - this included the desk personnel, the restaurant folks, the cleaning
Manager Response: Dear S_k782,  Your wonderful comments means so much to us. Thank you for giving us an awesome review. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. See you soon.  Sincerely,

Summary: Great property to stay at when you visit Santa Ana, Orange County either for Business or Pleasure. Very courteous staff and polite to all guests irrespective of whether they are regulars or not. The staff is excellent and long serving who know their guests very well. Special mention of Front Desk folks like Carol, Ashley, Frank, Jessie and all those whom I may have missed out inadvertently. Also the associates at the Bar and Dining area Gabriel, Jose, Ruben. Have used shuttle service quite often and Mr Bruce/Khalid go the extra mile to make their guests comfortable. Stay here and enjoy So Cal at its best!
Manager Response: Dear Sandeep0811,  I'm happy you enjoyed your stay at the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport.. Thank you for your feedback and positive comments, as they help us to become an even better property!  We hope your travels bring you back to our area and to see us again soon!   Sincerely,

Summary: I stay at this hotel on and off over several years span, when I am on business trip in the area and my primary hotel is sold out.  This is an average hum-so Holiday Inn that has gone through "selective" renovation.  By selective, I mean a new TV, new fixture and a few things here and there and not a total renovation.  No matter what, it's a very dated hotel but the Holiday Inn neon sign is new :)  The good: + Internet is reliable, well less than 1MBps but usable. + Starbuck coffee in the room - this is rare and unique to this hotel - I haven't seen it at other Holiday Inns. + Staff is friendly and they provide goodie bag to Platinum members.  The bad: - breakfast buffet is bad as it gets - eggs are always overcooked and dry (I have not had one breakfast there in which the eggs
Manager Response: Dear knowmyhotel,  Thank you very much for your comments. We highly appreciate your suggestions and take such matters seriously. Summary: I stayed here for 2 weeks for work, and it was really nice. It was close to John Wayne airport and to shopping and work. During the week take side roads and bypass the freeways. The rooms are very clean and the staff was very, very helpful with directions and things to do, not in downtown LA.
Manager Response: Dear Bristolsoxfan, I am elated that your two weeks stay with us was great. Our rooms are always immaculate and the staff always helpful. In your next visit please try our restaurant, we have an in house chef who makes excellent cuisine. Also try our inexpensive bar which offers different kinds of wine. Please feel free to give me a call at 714-481-6300 for your next reservation.  Sincerely,

Summary: I went twice for 2 weeks in that hotel on business trip. First time I had the room 285, which is in a corner next to the highway. It was a smocking room barely converted to non smocking, i.e. very stinky... Second time I had a more acceptable room. This hotel is very old and the sinks stinks as hell. The room were both time OK, beds are good. WiFi works better in the center of the hotel but always very slow anyway. The food is disgusting, try to avoid their restaurant. The bar is nice but too expensive. Swimming pool area is not very clean. I would not recommend to go there.
Manager Response: Dear Mary and Michel,  We are very sorry to hear you were disappointed with your recent hotel stay.  We appreciate your candid feedback and will share your comments with our staff as we always aim to improve our guest satisfaction. Thank you for taking the time to do a review of our hotel.

Summary: This hotel is a very modern and clean building, and that describes it all the way. The room was spacious and had all the facilities, and helpful staff. The pool and hot tub was very nice for a late night dip... I had a very pleasant time here.
Manager Response: Dear Blue B, Thank you for your wonderful review. We are glad you enjoyed your stay with us and found our Hotel "Satisfying",  Thank you for choosing our hotel. We look forward to your next stay with us.  Sincerely,  Holiday Inn Orange County Airport

Summary: This holiday inn has all the elements of a boutique hotel,  Rooms are large, modern understated decor and luxury linens.  None of the old blue floral bedspreads you find in all of the other holiday inns.  Beautiful breakfast area and attentative staff who were obviously happy with their jobs.  Reliable airport transfers 24 hours a day.  Very clean.
Manager Response: Dear dl2002, We are so glad that you found our hotel beautiful. Thank you so much for giving us a perfect review. We will be anxiously waiting to serve you again. Have a pleasant day. Sincerely,

Larger than normal entrance, extremely comfortable bed, nice little living space area, only downfall was the size of the bathroom, or lack of bathroom. You could not open the bathroom door all the way, it ran into the toilet and the toilet was so far way from the toilet paper dispenser. Enough countertop, but did not make up for the toilet issue. To elaborate on the bed, choice of firm or plush pillows, and very relaxing bed. Manager Response: Dear ktbug, Thank you so much for your comment. I am glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. Since you have mentioned that you will stay again, please do give me a call at 714-481-6300. Have a pleasant day.

Summary Heading: Best Holiday Inn I've stayed in in years
Summary: This Holiday Inn was up to date, clean, in the community areas as well as the room I had (king) was spacious and welcoming.The bed was VERY comfortable. Their shuttle service to John Wayne airport made it very convenient for us to drop our rental car off the night before our AM flight and get back to the hotel at that time with the shuttle as well as back to the airport in the AM. Manager Response: Dear Janka 929, We are so pleased with your comment that we are "The best Holiday Inn" you've stayed in years. We do our best to have all the IHG standards in our hotel. Staff were pleasant and helpful, restaurant was very nice, and all-in-all I would rate this hotel as a "would definitely come back."
Manager Response: markncharla,, Thank you for taking the time to post a review and share your experience with others. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our restaurant and pool during your stay and found our staff to be helpful.  We thank you for staying with us and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The front desk staff was wonderful, especially Clara. Our room wasn't ready yet, but our team was attending a business meeting across town and we still needed to get ready after our long plane ride. Clara worked her magic and secured us another room and we made it to our meeting just in time. Thank you for the exceptional service with a smile.
Manager Response: KrisValdez10, Thank you for the great review of our hotel. We are happy to hear you received wonderful service from Clara and the front desk staff. We thank you for sharing your guest experience and thank you for choosing Holiday Inn Orange County Airport.

Summary Heading: One of the Best Holiday Inns
Summary: The reception staff were very efficient and welcoming and the hotel has ample parking and conveniently situated for shopping and beaches.The rooms are extremely well appointed and very clean and all the staff and bar staff very friendly.We will certainly stay here again.Just one minor downside......laundry facilities could be expanded as a lot of the guests are in transit and need to use the machines so often there wasn't enough machines available.
Manager Response: Mr. Standish,  Thank you so much for your review and all the kind words about our hotel and staff.  We are happy to hear you had a great stay and enjoyed our location. Thank you for choosing the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport.

Summary: My teams have stayed here numerous times over the last ten years and have always enjoyed our good customer service from the management staff. Great location. Always accommodating to help us get the rooms we've needed.
Manager Response: Todd M.,  Thank you for your continuous support of our hotel and thank you for the great review. We are pleased to hear you are happy with our accomodations and service and look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: I stayed here for business and pleasure and enjoyed my stay very much.  It is quiet and relaxed and the staff is very nice.  They have a nice bar area and breakfast.  The rooms I stayed in were clean and I was very comfortable.  The location was very convenient, as well.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to give us a good review. I am glad that you found our hotel comfortable at the same time affordable. It was good that you experienced our breakfast and the beauty of our bar. The next time you come back please try our dinner. We have an in house chef that has very good reviews with his entrees. See again.  Sincerely,

Summary: Stayed here for a great price.it is in a nice area of OC.Rooms are nice and clean and friendly staff.has small lounge.free breakfast if PC member.Will def stay here again.outdoor pool and decent resturants in nearby Tustin.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for giving the time to write us a wonderful comment on tripadvisor. Our housekeeping staff always makes sure that the rooms are perfect. "Nice and clean" as you have said.   We do hope to see you again on your next trip.  Regards

Summary Heading: Great hotel, close to Orange County Airport (SNA)
Summary: Nice hotel, great shuttle service to the airport and surrounding areas (within a few miles of the hotel). The staff were extremely nice and helpful. Very convenient and comfortable place to stay at. Came in late at night after the airport was supposed to be closed, and the hotel sent the shuttle out to get us, even though they had stopped their runs.
Manager Response: Dear Alikarim, It was our pleasure to serve you. Thank you so much for giving us a wonderful comment. We are all looking forward to your next visit at the Holiday Inn Santa Ana.

Summary Heading: Business Trip for 6 Nights, made easier
Summary: Spent 6 nights at the hotel for a business trip. Visited 3 different locations owned by my company. Units were located at South Coast Plaza, Ontario Mills and Disneyland. What a great location to stay at and travel to all 3 was reasonable. Returning from a long day I could either turn on the flat screen of get in the jacuzzi/pool. Staff was very accommodating and helpful. Great value and closing located to a large mall, the ocean and of course Disneyland. I highly recommend this property for business or pleasure
Manager Response: Dear MilliganMonks,  It was indeed a pleasure that we have served you well. Rest assured your next visit with us will be amazing as always. Thank you for giving the time to give us a wonderful comment.

Summary: It was my first time staying at Holiday Inn. After a 24-hour flight, I was greeted by a big smile on Ashley's face. She was super nice and helpful with all my needs, I felt so welcomed and she immediately felt like family to me which is really heart-warming when being so far away from home. Ashley also helped me with getting around the city and suggested some of the most amazing restaurants and bars i have ever been to, gorgeous sights to see and places to shop. It was truely an amazing experience meeting Ashley. I look forward to staying at Holiday Inn and seeing her again.
Manager Response: Dear Tiffany A. Thank you for your comment regarding the amazing service. All of us here at the front desk loves Ashley as well. She always gives her 100%.

Summary: I stay at this hotel regularly  I am greeted like family by the best desk staff I have seen, and enjoy the service at the restaurant/bar with Laurie and Christine in charge.  Whenever I am in Orange County, I make certain to book the Holiday Inn.    George O

Summary: My family and I could have stayed at a less expensive hotel and almost did. The internet, when looking for a Hotel had you priced a lot higher. We had some regrets when we found out there was no free Breakfast. We stayed two nights, had three rooms and will stay there again. The desk Staff, especially Clara, went way out of their way to make sure our stay was PERFECT. We were late for breakfast and the wait staff and chef still served us.
Manager Response: In behalf of the Holiday inn santa ana, we thank you for your response. We are looking forward for your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Best service love the girl mariela

Upon arrival my teammates didn't wish me a happy birthday didn't have a birthday cake,and my coach who has been like  my brother for years couldn't even take me out to dinner. I told a server named Mariela about it and she brought a cake and a candle for me and my birthday turned out not the best but I can honestly say she made it 10x better I would definitely come back just for her service thank you to all the other servers who waited on me when they didn't for anyone else  and the holiday inn
Manager Response: We are honored to receive such a beautiful review. Mariela indeed does a great job. The food and beverage manager trained her well. Thank you for your comment.

Summary: Whan I arrived at the Holiday Inn OCA I was tired from traveling for 8 hours straight. it was early and I wasn't sure if i could check in, but Clara worked her magic and found me a room that was just right. Thank you so much. I also had some problems logging on to the internet. I called the front desk, who called Cesar with engineering. He showed up promtly to help, I was surfing the web in no time. I will definately recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Santa Ana airport area, it is a real Gem.
Manager Response: Dear Mary B, We were blown away by your generous comment "The best in town". As always our hotel has very high standards. Perfection in service and customer satisfaction is our motto. Thank you very much Mary. See you soon.

Summary: My family and I booked 10 rooms for 7 nights and we were thrilled with the Holiday Inn! Everthing was easy from booking to checking in to checking out. The daily breakfast was delicious and the servers always had a smile for us! The pool area was spacious and clean. The laundry room was a nice perk. The shuttle service was also a nice convenience.  Don the sales manager was right there to assist or direct me to the right person! The rooms were nice and clean.  We will definately stay there again and recommend to anyone going to Santa Ana! To the entire staff at the Holiday Inn thank you for making our trip so nice!
Manager Response: Dear Hegarty28, Thank you so much for your comment that we have exceeded your expectations. The whole staff of the Holiday Inn Santa Ana Orange County Airport always strives to go above and beyond. We are thrilled that you were satisfied with your stay with us. We are looking forward to seeing you again.

Summary: The hotel is a real treat for the frequent business traveller as it feels like a resort.  The pool is clean and in good shape.  The rooms are great.  Everything is very clean and fresh and everything works.  Internet speed was brilliant! Had some food in the hotel and was wowed by the service and value of the menu! The parking area and grounds are well kept and pretty to look at.  I'll stay there again for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a wonderful review. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: Clara was extremely helpful in helping me extend my stay. Service was also very good at breakfast each morning. Room was clean and comfortable, and everything worked. Bed was comfortable. Breakfast selection was adequate but lacked, for example, omelets cooked-to-order .
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and thankful for giving us a perfect score. Please visit us again and experience our excellent service one more time. Thank you.

Summary: Booked online without any knowledge of the area.   Showed up after a long day of flying to the welcoming friendly smile of Clara!  She was fast, friendly and a perfect representative for your company.  When we arrived at our room, we were blow away with the large size, fresh appearance and cleanliness.  My daughter is going to be attending Chapman University and we will stay here during our next visits ....when  we move her in and for parents weekend!  Booking it before we leave!  Thank you for offering such a wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your comment. We were so delighted by the words that you were blown away by our rooms and that we were beyond awesome. Clara is my front desk associate and she does a very good job as well as my other front liners. See you soon.

Summary: We were greeted by Clara at the front desk. Not a planned trip so the room of course was not ordered in advance. She helped us with everything. Thank you Clara. The hotel is beautiful and all the staff is so kind. 100% recommended.
Manager Response: Dear NRamirez333,  The perfect review that you gave us was fantastic. In behalf of the Holiday Inn staff we would like to thank you.

Summary Heading: Best Holiday Inn for me and my family
Summary: Hotel appearance both excellent inside and out.  The outside was well kept, from the lawn to the building.  Not one piece of trash to be found and the building as if it were new.  The check in area super clean and the staff very friendly and inviting.  The rooms were spacious, clean, and quite.  The beds were super comfortable.  The channel selection to watch televsion was excellent.  The breakfast was great and the wait staff personnel were very professional.  Easy access to the highway, perfectly located to places like Disneyland, Legoland and San Diego.  This will be may hotel to stay at when visiting the Santa Ana area.  Great job to you and your entire staff Mr. Frank.
Manager Response: Dear Joelf1981,  I am elated with your review. My team takes great pride in what they do and always gives their 100%. We are all honored for your comment that we are the best Holiday Inn. Looking forward to see you soon.  Thank you

Summary: We have board meetings here several times a year...I've been coming for a decade.  Good accommodations for a Holiday Inn...good meetings facilties...and great staff, tremendous attitude.  And the salmon banquet dinner we had was among the best I've ever had.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time in giving us a good review. We are glad that you enjoyed the Salmon as one of your best dinner. Our Chef is a connoisseur with different kinds of cuisine. Please come again and experience your next great meal.

Summary: let me start by sharing the great staff that this hotel have, i stay there for one night and was absolutly incredible , the food was delicious ,the manager of the restaurant greeted us and helped me to choose a great bottle of wine , he was very friendly, my room (124) was very clean and everything was in order. the enviroment is family owned , the price was good and overall everything was wonderful .... i cant wait to come back to cali and stay in this hotel
Manager Response: We are very happy with your comment regarding our restaurant and rooms. As always our service is above and beyond. Looking forward for your next visit with us.

Summary: This place was just right after a late evening flight into John Wayne Airport.   Check in was efficient and the staff was friendly.   My room was clean and nice.    Decent restaurant and bar on site.   I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank You Very Much for your comment  All of our guests flying in from John Wayne Airport find our Hotel a perfect place to stay. Efficient check in and check out is our specialty. Looking forward to seeing you again.

Summary: I've stayed here numerous times on business trips.  Restaurant food is ok, but the breakfast buffet is great!  Rooms are fine - typical Holiday Inn. Clara was especially gracious and charming when I left my bag and had to return to pick it up.
Manager Response: We are Glad to hear all the good comments that you gave us. Clara our Front Desk Agent is indeed always gracious and charming. Thank You also for expressing the Greatness of our Breakfast Buffet. We are all looking forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: The JMA sponsored 2013 Ride To Remember was headquartered at this Holiday Inn. The rooms, staff, and food was simply outstanding! Everyone went out of their way to make us feel at home! The airport shuttle was a big plus! We highly recommend this hotel if you are planning to stay in Orange County!!!! Thank you!!!!!
Manager Response: We are Honored by your compliment that our Service and Food was outstanding. It was definitely our pleasure to have served your group and glad that we were part of making your stay with us "A Ride to Remember".

The Sales Office, Patricia and Don were so helpful as I was planning this from Virginia. The wait staff and Alex catered to our every need.  Ashley, Clara and the new night manager are like family.  I am going back in December with family.  Thanks Holiday Inn at Orange County Airport
Manager Response: Thank you for commenting that we are an awesome hotel. We are indeed elated that you had a wonderful stay with us. We hope to see you again.

Summary: Very helpful and friendly stuff, in particularly Ashley did a great job. . Indoor bar and restaurant make the location very convenient. Room service is perfect.  Good and free shuttle service within 3 miles
Manager Response: Thank You So Much for giving us 5 stars. Ashley is my Front Desk Supervisor and she is very good with customer service as well as my other Team Members. The Restaurant, Bar, Room Service, Housekeeping, Sales and Engineering Personnel always strives for Excellence. Thank You Very Much and see you soon.

Summary: I stayed here for a long weekend with friends recently.  The hotel met my standards for cleanliness, service, and comfort.  Each room comes equipped with a fridge and microwave and there are no addition charges for internet or parking.    The location is great - only 10 minutes from the airport but far enough that you're not bothered by the sounds of the airplanes all night.  They also provide a free shuttle to and from the airport.  We chose the location because we would be visiting several areas during our stay (Huntington Beach, Newport Beach, Anaheim) and were very happy to be able to get to all destinations within 20 minutes.    Special note:  we requested several changes to our reservation due to internal scheduling issues within our group.  The hotel was extremely
Manager Response: We are so happy that you and your friends had a wonderful long weekend with us. Hearing that we met your standards for Service, Cleanliness and Comfort pleased us much. We hope to see you again at the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport.

A Quiet Hotel that has free parking, a nice outdoor pool and hot tub, laundry facilities, a breakfast bar, lounge and gym.  The service at the Lounge and the front desk was always professional and genuinely friendly! We felt welcomed and taken care of.  The rooms have a coffee maker, microwave, mini-fridge, A/C, TV. The beds are comfortable and have plenty of pillows choices.  This Holiday Inn is a step above the others, so don’t let the chain name hinder your selection and take advantage of the great price for a stay here.
Manager Response: Thank You very much for your kind words. As always we at the Holiday Inn strives to give service that is above and beyond. We are looking forward for your next visit with us.

Summary Heading: Easy to get to and from and great digs

Location is easy to get to and while it is right next to the freeway we had no issues with traffic noise. Just about a mile from the hotel there is a very sizeable & nice shopping area and the former Marine Corp Air Station (MCAS) blimp hangers are easily viewable. Those things are HUGE and pretty awesome looking! Lots of food choices in the area and you're only about 10 minutes from the coast. Rooms have refrigerators also.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for taking the time to post a comment and share your guest experience with others. Thank You for choosing Holiday Inn Orange County Airport.

Manager Response: Thank you for a wonderful review. We appreciate you sharing your Hotel experience and we hope to see you again soon.
