Summary: Stayed one night here for business travel.  It was convenient, clean, quiet and efficient.  I had the breakfast buffet downstairs for 9.99 since it was convenient and it was small but good.  The hotel and breakfast staff are excellent.  Parking is very convenient too.
Manager Response: Dear FamilleSB,    We are so happy to hear that you had such a pleasant stay with us. Thank you for your kind review and we hope the next time your business has you back in Orange County that we will get to see you again!  Thank you, Management

Summary: what most impressed me about this hotel was the impeccable customer service.  From the first moment of arrival and greeting, swift check-in and information from the front desk ( including restaurant lists, take out food and delivery places and the fact that the hotel shuttle will take you to the airport and /or dinner locations within 3 miles), this John Wayne Airport area location was the best.  As this was a two- day stay for a business conference, had the opportunity to deal extensively with the Food and beverage/banquet business meeting staff.  There are several meeting rooms, and all was set up--early,--and to our group's specifications.  Staff was ever present to ensure all was going smoothly, and this was a welcome change.  The hotel also has a small bar area, which also
Manager Response: Dear Wdee2013,   Thank you so much for the fantastic review! We appreciate you taking the time to thoroughly review our hotel. The staff are so excited to hear such wonderful things said about them and how great your stay was. It is also fantastic that you got to experience our Food and Beverage staff and to use our banquet facilities. We look forward to having you stay with us again the next time you are in beautiful Orange County! Thank you, Management

Summary: This is a nice hotel close to John Wayne airport and not that far from the beach. It took about 5 minutes to drive from the airport to the HI, and about 10 minutes from the HI to the ocean. There is not much around the hotel, so you will have to drive a short distance.  The room is a typical king: Bed, HDTV (even though most of the channels are not HD); fridge, microwave, desk, couch, bathroom. Water pressure was good and plenty of hot water. One negative was that the walls are pretty thin. I could hear the TV in the next room very clearly. The wireless was sometime weak and at maximum I only had four out of five bars. Everything was clean, including the outside areas.   Breakfast was also typical: eggs, bacon, sausage, cereal, pastries/breads, and each morning there was a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review jzak11!   We sincerely appreciate you taking the time to thoroughly review our property. You will be happy to know that we are in the process of a major change to our wireless internet and are expanding our bandwidth significantly. We are excited about this major upgrade! We are glad you had a good stay with us and look forward to having you back the next time you are in town!

Summary Heading: Nice staff and very well maintained
Summary: I spent the night during a 2 day seminar that was being held here.  The staff was very nice and extremely helpful.  The facilities are well maintained and very comfortable.  Due to the seminar I did not have time to check out the pool.  The location is close to shopping, the airport and right next to the freeway.  there is more than enough parking (and it's free, something you don't find in LA).  I have been to seminars held here in the past and they all have been more than pleasant experiences.  I will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you gwlowe for your great review!  We always enjoy hearing what guests think of us and we are happy we can host your seminar time and time again. Next time you are with us, please do take some time to have a quick dip in our heated pool or relax in our Jacuzzi. We look forward to seeing you again the next time you have a seminar here!

Summary: I recently stayed at the Holiday Inn Santa Ana for 3 nights. The hotel is well situated and close to the airport and shopping malls. The room was pretty good, but could do with a make over. However, the bed was comfortable and the breakfast good. Nothing to complain about (except for the slow and weak wireless internet), but nothing really remarkable or special. The staff are friendly and polite.
Manager Response: Dear defector,   We are glad that you had a good stay with us and enjoyed our rooms, breakfast, and kind staff. Our internet was upgraded within the past week and we are so pleased with how much quicker it is! Next time you stay with us please let us know how much better it is!   Thank you, Management

Summary: I recently was in Santa Ana on business and had a 9-day stay at the Holiday Inn Santa Ana-Orange County Airport.  The hotel has a great location near the freeway and major roads, and it's possible to get to several nearby good restaurants and tourist attractions, as well as beaches, with minimal hassle.   The room was very clean and nicely appointed.  The hotel staff was helpful and pointed us in the right direction more than once for restaurant choices.  That said, we did eat at the hotel in the mornings and one evening, and the food was quite good.  This hotel is a good choice for someone who either is in Santa Ana on business or for someone traveling for leisure who wants quick access to a number of tourist-type attractions, but is ok with not staying right next door to those
Manager Response: Dear ruz,   We sincerely appreciate your wonderful review! We are lucky to have been able to have you spend so long with us. I will be sure to pass along this review to the managers and our Front Desk department. They will be happy to hear such kind things said about them! We hope to see you again the next time you wind up in Orange County!

Summary Heading: Good stop over on way to Disneyland - free airport and Disneyland Shuttle
Summary: We came in late to SNA and took the free shuttle to the hotel.  We called when we were at baggage claim and just waited a minute or two for them to pick us up.  The room was fine, beds were very comfortable.  The hotel rooms are a bit dated.  The door in our bathroom for example wouldn't close past the toilet and some of the wall outlet covers were broken. But the sheets, towels, pillows etc were all very nice and higher end.  We slept well and had no troubles with noise as others have reported.  Breakfast choices were good. The kids and I had the buffet ($9.95/adults - $4.95 /' kids).  My husband ordered a omelette off the menu. All were very good.  Note that kids eat free at holiday inn, but that doesn't include the buffet.   We then took the free disneyland shuttle.  I
Manager Response: Dear audigal,  We truly appreciate you taking the time to complete such a detailed review of our hotel and your recent visit to us and Disneyland. We are very happy you got to utilize the wonderful complimentary services our hotel provides and that our staff was able to make your stay fantastic! We hope to see you again for another family vacation that takes you out our direction!

Summary: This hotel was really nice and very comfortable to sleep at. The hotel picked us up from the airport by shuttle (parents be sure to ask for them to bring a carseat if you didn't bring yours), and took us to the hotel to check in and immediately took us to Disneyland. They asked what time we'd like to be picked up, and was able to pick us up fromt he front of the park. The hotel was very clean, and the bed was one of the most comfortable beds I've slept on at a hotel; very fluffy. I would stay at this hotel again, if I need to be in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you travel_expert_84 for your fantastic review!   We are so pleased that you had a wonderful experience with us and we were able to make your trip to Disneyland a memorable one. We are also happy that you got to utilize our complimentary airport and Disneyland shuttle.   We anticipate welcoming you back the next time you are back in Orange County!

Summary Heading: Thin wall, good housekeeping, huge room, great deal and reception was ok
Summary: The room was HUGE!!!  The housekeeping was good also.  Always give plenty of toiletries.  However, when I arrived, I knew I booked my room through the Holiday Inn website, but the receptionist insisted that I booked it through tripadvisor and wouldn't let me have breakfast.  Since I am a Priority Member I know I will get free breakfast, but unfortunately they did not give me breakfast and told me because I booked through Tripadvisor, so not qualify for complimentary breakfast.  The other time at the reception, it was ok.  For the money, I think it is quite a deal.  Parking is free.  Close to shopping center "The District" near Barranca/Jamboree.  The hotel was fully booked.  A group of young kids was on my floor and late at night, I can hear them talking.  The walls are thin at
Manager Response: Dear happyglobaltraveler,  We really appreciate you taking the time to write such a thorough review about the Holiday Inn - Orange County Airport. We are so glad to hear that you had a good time and that we could surprise you in such a positive way!  We do apologize for the confusion with the breakfast for Priority Club members. Breakfast is not complimentary, but is available to our Platinum Priority Club Members complimentary as part of their local benefits for being loyal guests.   We have had quite a few teams stay with us recently and we sincerely apologize for the noise concern. Young kids can be quite loud, but a courtesy call to the front desk at any hour of the day, and we would gladly get in touch with the correct room to remedy that concern for you!  We want all of our guests to have the best stay possible and we hope that the next time you visit sunny Orange County that we can accommodate your hospitality needs and make this stay even better!

Summary: The ladies at the front desk were horrible. Downright rude most of the time. A plus is its located right next to the interstate, but you can definitely hear that at night. Worst hotel I have been to in terms of service.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment about your experience with the Holiday Inn - Orange County Airport. We do sincerely apologize for any inconvenience we have caused you and for the service you experienced with us.  We understand how frustrating this can be and hope that next time you are in town, we can be given the opportunity to change your mind and show you why we have the best service scores in our area.

Summary Heading: Nice, but beware of the thin ceilings
Summary: I travel weekly to Orange County on business, and am a Priority Club Platinum member. I have stayed at this hotel quite often. The staff is very friendly and helpful, and the rooms are clean and fairly well maintained.   They have a nice free breakfast for Priority Club members, and a nice restaurant and bar setting. The bartenders are awesome!  There is a swimming pool and hot tub that are well maintained.  My only issue with this hotel is the noise. The hotel is right next to a very busy freeway (CA 55). Freeway noise doesn't bother me much, but others may be sensitive to it. If so, ask for a room facing the back of the hotel.  If you have the misfortune of getting a room on the 1st or 2nd floors, beware that the ceilings are very thin. One night, the gentleman in the room
Manager Response: Dear rwmiller56,  Thank you for being a Priority Club Platinum member and writing a review about your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you found our hotel well maintained and clean. We work very hard to ensure our facilities and service are superior and we strive to be the best Holiday Inn around. I would like to offer a sincere apology regarding the noise that you have experienced during your stay. I understand the discomfort this has caused you. I am happy to let you know that our Holiday Inn Santa Ana-Orange County Airport, CA hotel has gone through renovations last June 8 to June 15, 2012. And I hope on your next visit you will give a chance to make your stay as best as it can be.  If there is anything we can do to make your next stay more comfortable, please do not hesitate to ask the Manager on Duty. Thank you for staying with us.  Sincerely,  Anthony M Case Manager IHGCare

Summary: This hotel is well run, the employees are trained to do what they can to make your stay easy.  With Priority Club status, you get a drink ticket each day for the bar, free breakfast coupon (great homemade salsa for the eggs), and a discount for restaurant.  They have recently remodeled many of the rooms with new carpet adn new beds, as well as some new furniture.  Conveniently located to Orange County airport (5 minutes) and easy access to the 55, 5, 405, and 57 freeways.  Ask for a room on the back side, away from the freeway.
Manager Response: Our service is our #1 priority for our guests and we are so excited that you recognized that in our staff here. We certainly strive to make everyone's stay as comfortable and welcoming as possible!  It's also fantastic that you take advantage of our loyalty program: Priority Club and all the local benefits we provide. We thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel and we hope you visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Good location to SNA with shuttle service
Summary: Stayed for a couple of days with the family. Shuttle service to the airport as well as near by mall. It also does a shuttle to Disney but was told they go at 9  am and pick up at 9the pm which is great if you have no plans to leave the park. Free parking and may be smart to rent a car due to food places not all within walking distance. Overall hotel was good and staff was helpful.
Manager Response: We are so thrilled to have been able to have you consider us on your family trip out here.  If you visited Disneyland, we hope you had an incredible time!  You are correct, our shuttle does run twice a day to Disneyland at 9am and 9pm. That is specifically to miss traffic times.  Otherwise our poor guests would be sitting in the shuttle in the parking lots that are our freeways, sorely missing out on a great time at Disneyland or relaxing by the pool here.  Our free shuttle also runs within a 3-mile radius to many close shopping centers with an abundance of food choices and restaurants.   We hope to see you back in sunny Orange County soon!

Summary: A nice Holiday Inn, on my visit it was clean and seems to be well-managed. The hotel grounds are beautifully landscaped. Chambermaid service is excellent. The bathroom in my room was quite small, two persons trying to use it together probably wouldn’t work. The rest of the room was quite spacious, certainly more space than is needed for a business traveler.  The rate is a little high, though not as high as the Embassy Suites around the corner.  My rate as of 19-APR-2012 was 140.00 + other charges.  Pros:  Ten miles from Disneyland, airport shuttle available. Fitness center available. 24 hour business center. Pool. Jacuzzi.Runners and walkers who prefer not to use the hotel fitness center have a .75 mile circuit around Hotel Terrace Drive, all sidewalk. The hotel is nicely
Manager Response: A huge thank you for taking the time to review and recommend our hotel to business travelers! We have many loyal business guest and enjoy seeing their smiling faces every week. We appreciate your critique of our property and letting us know where our opportunity for improvement lies. We will be completing a small gift shop by the end of this summer for our guest's enjoyment! We hope to welcome you back the next time you are in beautiful Orange County.

Summary: I stayed at the hotel in April, 2012 for a week.  I usually stay closer to our corporate office in Fullerton but wanted to try something closer to the airport.  I was generally pleased with the hotel.  There is no question that the place is "older", but the refurb work that has been done is nice  The staff is great - breakfast service in particular.  At other places with a buffet, I'm finished eating before I get a cup of coffee.  Here, I had coffee within a minute - and a "to go" cup each day without even asking.  That's a nice change from my regular Holiday Inn.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to express how positive and different your stay was from other hotels. We pride ourselves on our customer service and our breakfast staff is particularly exceptional!   Thank you for giving us the opportunity to have you stay with us and hopefully we shall see you again. I think you will be pleasantly surprised with the upgrades our hotel continues to be making every day!

Summary: Best part of this hotel is proximity to the airport. We had a room near the pool, which is nice, but right next to the highway. There is no free breakfast, and the hotel is showing its age. I walked to 4 different locations where there should have been ice makers, but there were none. The staff was ok, not great. There's a computer in the lobby which is free to use, but as typical with 'business centers' the printer was out of ink.
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear that your stay was not a great one with us. We sincerely appreciate you taking the time to let us know of some concerns you had with our property and the areas where we can improve upon. We take every review seriously and I have shared yours with management in order to improve our property for our future guests. We invite you back to give us another chance to impress you!

Summary: we stayed for 1 night as we worked our way up the cali coast.  it was a good hotel with a good location.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us along your trip up the coast! That sounds amazing and I hope the rest of your journey is full of adventures to last a lifetime.

Summary: This hotel was nice!!! I love how close it is to the airport!!! It met all my requirements for travel!!
Manager Response: We are glad to have been able to make your stay a great one!  We sincerely appreciate you taking the time to review our hotel. Please join us again the next time you are in the area!

Summary: This hotel is undergoing some renovations; initially we were placed in a room that smelled terribly of cigarettes, but they kindly moved us to a renovated room that was very clean. the location is not good - there is absolutely nothing within walking distance, and upon arrival we were approached by a stranger in the parking lot who was asking us for gas money. The hours of operation for the hotel kitchen for breakfast and lunch are very limited so be prepared to dine out; although the kitchen is open fairly late into the evening. The staff were very nice. The room was very clean but the bed was of poor quality.
Manager Response: We are so sorry to hear that your stay was not up to the standards that we pride ourselves on having here. We are just finishing up our "upgrade" to our rooms, including upgraded amenities in our new upgraded room types, larger TV's, new and updated decor, and new furniture.   We are also 100% non-smoking and unfortunately sometimes guests do not adhere to that. We do a proper follow up procedure with those rooms before anything else occurs.  There is also a shuttle service we provide that runs from 5am - 11pm, within a 3 mile radius to local restaurants, malls, businesses and the airport. It needs to be scheduled, but we are more than happy to accommodate any needs you have when you stay with us.   We welcome you back to stay with us and hope that we will have the opportunity to change your mind the next time you are back in town!

Summary: This is my Go To Hotel when I have an early flight from John Wayne Airport.   The added benefit is that I can park my car there for the week on their special rate and take the shuttle to the airport in the morning.   I have found the staff is always superb and the shuttle is always on schedule as well.  It is an awesome option if you are vacationing and parking a car and live an hour away.   I go in for the night, have a nice somewhere and don't have to stress out about an early flight.    The parking is an added bonus becuase parking at airport lots is expensive if travelling for vacation.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My company hosted a gem and mineral show at this hotel in November.  We made a lot of unusual requests and demands on the hotel staff, and their response was amazing.  They anticipated our needs, and responded promptly to all our requests.  The condition of the hotel was beautiful, very nice amenities in the rooms - refrigerator, microwave, and flat-screen TV.  Food in the restaurant was also very good.  I stayed for 5 nights, and have no complaints at all!
Manager Response: West Coast Gem and Mineral Show - we love hosting your event! It gives us something to look forward to and a sense of excitement fills the hotel. We are so glad you have had the chance to see our hotel go through the beautiful upgrades we have done to our property and thoroughly enjoy the positive feedback we receive from your vendors. Looking forward to hosting you again in May!

Summary Heading: The best Service I could EVER DREAM OF!
Summary: For one month, I traveled to Santa Ana California for 4 weeks. I made reservations to the Holiday Inn. I must say that the service I received was by far the best service I have ever had.  I personally travel allot and I am big on feeling at home in an establishment. It was enough of an impact that I remembered most of the staffs names and am forever going to remember the hospitality they gave me. Leah, one of the managers made me feel like I had known her for years. Ashley, Jesse, Nazario and Lawerence made sure that transportation was never a bother for me. Lastly Khalid and I were able to talk politics to a point that made me feel like I was still in West Virginia with my family.  I would recommend this staff above any 6 star resort and will make sure next time I return to
Manager Response: We are so lucky to have been given the opportunity to have you stay with us for so long! The pleasure was definitely ours. We cannot wait for you to come out and experience our hospitality again with our Holiday Inn family, so we can make you feel like home... even across the country.

Summary: I just spent 2 weeks at the Holiday Inn Orange County Aiport.  For a Road Warrior a hotel can either help a trip or contribute to a disaster.  I have nothing but praise for this hotel.  My room was nice with microwave and refrigerator.  From the shuttle driver to front desk people were nice and helpful.  Every single person that worked there gave a greeting in the hall.  The ladies who worked in the bar were outgoing.  The restaurant servers were friendly.  There was a full breakfast each morning with almost anything you could think of asa choice- cereal, fruit, yogart pastries and then hot eggs, potatoes, bacon, sausage, pancakes or French toast.  There is not an abundance of restaurants within walking distance, but the shuttle would take you almost anywhere you wanted to go.
Manager Response: We are so delighted to see that you had such a wonderful time with us!  We truly enjoy welcoming everyone to our property and making sure that even "road warriors" such as yourself, have a memorable stay with us every time. We cannot wait to have you back and to make another great impression on you!

Summary: Went on vacation with my wife and stayed at this OLD hotel because of proximity to a friend's place.  During our first stay, the room was generally fine however finding a live cockroach in the bathroom gave my phobic wife a big scare.  The receptionist at the time said it was the first time they had any pests and promised to spray the room for insects.    We went away for a couple of nights to another city and returned for our second spell at the same hotel arriving at midnight.  There was no one to help with the bags and I had to get a trolley and load it with all the bags myself.  As soon as we opened the room door, we were greeted by a dead mouse in the middle of the room.  Upon informing the receptionist, the lady said it was the first time they had such an incident and said
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very good hotel for a meeting - great staff.
Summary: The staff was very nice, the meeting room was clean and refreshed appropriately. The food was fine for the price point of the Hotel. The service made our stay great, specifically, Lorrie in the bar, she got my food to me quickly when I had not planned ahead (twice) other servers may have been annoyed with me, with cause, but not here, the entire staff was very efficient and friendly. I wish I had time to get in the pool, it looked great. My room was huge and clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for a week due to work training, the room was clean and the price was reasonable. The staff was extremley courteous and accomodating. The location is central to all that Orange County offers. I would defnately stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful compliments. We cannot wait to have you back in the future!

Summary: Hotel Holiday Inn, nice hotel for business travelers. Hotel offered me an excellent clean room facing swimming pool. In my package breakfast was included with free beverages in the evening. Dinner was not having much choices for me nor i was taking it in the night at hotel.  The best part of this hotel was staff, they were very-very friendly & supportive. They helped me a lot as i was new in this region & spent more than 15 days at this place. I have no regret to mention. Some minor issues are every where, that should be minimise on continuous improvements.  My best wishes for Holiday Inn.
Manager Response: We are thrilled you had such a wonderful stay with us here at the Holiday Inn – Orange County Airport! It is fantastic that you had the opportunity to enjoy all the wonderful amenities our hotel provides, especially from our Panini restaurant and bar. Our staff strives to make every guest’s stay the best it can possibly be. We are also very excited about the renovations our hotel has recently gone through. Our newly decorated rooms have 32 inch flat screen TVs with DirecTV now! We hope to have the pleasure of you coming come back and enjoying them very soon.

Summary Heading: a very average at best, but more of a dissapointment...
Summary: The building looks decent from outside but once you come inside, you can tell the wear and tear.  It seems like the entire building has been somewhat affected by an earthquake since there are so many uneven/craked floor surface.  The carpets looks old and dark. There is no smell stale yet, but it's getting there.    For $120/day, the breakfast was dissapointing.  Each morning something was always wrong with the breakfast. First day, the hot water for tea was luke warm.  The second day, no waiter/waitress came to serve.  So I had no coffee.  Third day, some of the breakfast items were empty.  I stopped going to breakfast and bought my own for the remaining 4 days.  It was dissappointing to say the least.    They do have a small gym, self-pay laudry room, a small pool, and other
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room we stayed in was clean and there was ample parking.  Lots of places to dine and shop nearby.  Was disappointed that it did not have free breakfast to start our day.  We ended up spending $30 for breakfast.  Breakfast was ok although the staff did not offer a kids meal which was free...gave us a regular menu so ended up paying...we did not know it at that time but they did.  Will look for another hotel next time....for the price we paid it should have had a free breakfast.
Manager Response: We are very proud of how clean and convenient our hotel is and appreciate your comments.  I will certainly speak to our restaurant servers about making sure to offer kids menus when an adult is purchasing a meal.  We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Friendly staff and inviting if small lobby area.  The benefits for Priority Club members are more generous than many Holiday Inns offer, so you don't have to be a platinum-level member to enjoy a good complimentary breakfast and relax with a beverage in the evening.   Rooms were large with a respectable work space.  The only negative on the room was in the bathroom - the toilet paper is placed oddly far from the toilet.  A child wouldn't be able to reach. Nicer toiletries.  Adequate fitness center with a selection of cardio equipment.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your experience at our hotel.  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed yourself and the benefits of being a loyal Priority Club member! I hope that we have the pleasure of welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: The room was very clean, but there was a smell coming from somewhere, but I couldn't identify from where.  It wasn't overly strong, really only noticible when you entered the room.  The bathroom was very clean, new all around.  Very friendly staff all over.  Some rooms are very far from the lobby, long hallways, so try to avoid that.  If there's a busy convention going on in the hotel, there isn't enough parking.  Restaurant food was very good and large portions.  Overall a good place to stay, comfortable bedding, good cable t.v..  I just wish I could have identified the minor smell.
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Holiday Inn Orange County Airport. Thank you and we hope that the next time you are in town that we can have the opportunity to accommodate you again!

Summary: I was only at the hotel a few hours, I checked in late and left the next morning to catch an early flight.  The staff was friendly and polite.  The room was clean, quiet, and comfortable.  As a priority club member I was given a coupons for free breakfast, a free drink, as well as a discount for dinner.  If I have business in the area again I'll be staying here for sure.
Manager Response: We are certainly glad you enjoyed your stay here at Holiday Inn Orange County Airport.  Thank you and we hope to see you back here soon!

Summary Heading: won't be returning to this hotel
Summary: Although a previous stay at this hotel was acceptable, my most recent stay was a bummer.  Got a couple of letters notifying that they would be testing fire alarms  at 10:00.  Unfortunately, what the letters failed to warn is that the testing would continue until 15:30.  I returned to the hotel at 12 to find that my room hadn't been cleaned and despite asking for it to be cleaned, it wasn't.  Actually the room was never cleaned that day.    The clincher was waking up the next morning to a cold shower just before leaving for a 24 hour trip to Europe.  Although one of the front desk staff was helpful in trying the water in two other rooms, alas, no hot water was to be found in the hotel, and of course there was no attempt at an emergency call to maintenance.  Traveling in the third
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Surprisingly easy to find with close access to where we needed to be!
Summary: I booked this hotel for the night of January 15th, 2010 and it was definitely a good choice. My friend and I had planned to wake up early the next morning to go to the Orange County Swap Meet and this hotel is about 2-3 exits away. We were there before we even realized it!  The beds were comfy, not as comfy as beds I would be accustomed since I prefer my beds super soft, but my friend thought his bed was the best he had ever slept in. The hotel doesn't have many frills, though there is a restaurant and I believe room service available. There is a pool but since it is January, we didn't even go to check it out. Free internet is available also and that is always a plus in my book.  The hotel desk people were friendly when we checked in and I do have to say a concern of mine
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our property.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Next time be sure to try our Panini Restaurant and Lounge.  Also, our pool and spa are open all year long and are heated to a very comforatable temperature.  Hope to see you again!  Don't forget the Orange County Fair next summer.  We even have a daily shuttle for the fair.

Summary: We stayed at the HI OC Airport for 4 nights (I actually haven't even checked out yet). My first initial thoughts while approaching the hotel were that it look very clean and well kept from the outside. The front desk agent upon check-in was helpful and polite. However all positive thoughts went downhill from that point on. As you walked further into the hotel it smelt like feces, our room had tiny black curly hairs in the tub, around the tub and on the bed, the toilet was off balance because it looks as if it was built in the wrong spot and it was well beyond arms length to reach the nearest TP holder (I know that last one is a little petty). I didn't notice the tub hairs until that morning and when I alerted the Front Desk and they looked at me with more disgust than I did at
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've really had great luck with Holiday Inn Express.  Every one I've stayed at, except the San Diego location, has been over and above what I've expected.  The rooms are new and very clean.  Customer service is very professional and the whole feel of each location is top notch for the price.  My first choice will be Holiday Inn or Holiday Inn Express from now on.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The 9.95 breakfast buffet----not so good, no oatmeal but lots of white rice and believe it or not, orange juice is not included in the price. I have never heard of such a thing on a breakfast buffet. Rooms excellent, very attentive front desk.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very serviceable. Good value for money.
Summary: Didn't have time to get in the pool, but it looked inviting;  we were visiting family in the area, so we just needed a clean roomfor the night and a good breakfast.  This hotel provided both.   Room was bigger than some we've stayed at on our current road trip.  Will visit 7 or 8 Holiday Inns and will rate them all.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Having stayed at other Holday Inss as well as other comparable properties, I'd say this location was "ok" but it had its share of problems.  Good points were staff was friendly and helpful, grounds were kept clean, great access to freeways, and good location to beaches, restaurants, shopping, Disneyland and Knott's.  Bad points?  Super smelly in room air conditioner (had maintenance look at it twice but all they could do was spray some deorderant to try cover up the smell) and shower curtains that wreaked of a urine-like smell when left wet for a few hours.  Not too impressed to say the least.  Unfortunately I prepaid for this hotel with an online hotel discounter so I couldn't check out early and go to another place.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel for business travellers.  Freeway close with lots of places for dinning.  Ask for the rooms towards the back of the building to minimize the noise from the freeway as it is directly across the street. Only negatives were two burnt out light bulbs in the room & the king size bed mattress was a little old & saggy.  However, we slept well due to wearing ourselves out at Disneyland.
